File SpeciationCommands.cpp¶

Contains the ApplySpec class for performing calculations of the coalescence tree structure and generating the SQL database objects from the command-line.

Contents

  • Definition (necsim/SpeciationCommands.cpp)
  • Detailed Description
  • Includes

Definition (necsim/SpeciationCommands.cpp)¶

  • Program Listing for File SpeciationCommands.cpp

Detailed Description¶

Samuel Thompson 19/07/2017 MIT Licence. For use on the SQL database outputs of necsim v3.1+. It requires command line parameters and generates a data object from them. Contact: samuel.thompson14@imperial.ac.uk or thompsonsed@gmail.com
